item.title: Double it
item.dc:creator: @zonus_warrior zonus warrior
item.description:
@zonus_warrior wrote:

i didnt “steal” you code i google java loop and found http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/for.html

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7662) { for(int i = 0; i >= 2; i++) { hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + (misc.random(15)); } stillgfx(26, absY, absX); stillgfx(17, EnemyY, EnemyX); PkingDelay = 10; wepdelay = 10; UseBow = true; }

BTW it should be if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7662) { for(int i = 0; i >= 2; i++) { hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + (misc.random(15))); } stillgfx(26, absY, absX); stillgfx(17, EnemyY, EnemyX); PkingDelay = 10; wepdelay = 10; UseBow = true; }
at least for my server anyway

.>
